'''25w36b''' is the eighth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.9]], released on September 2, 2025.<ref>{{snap|25w36b|id=a|September 2, 2025}}</ref> It fixes two crash bugs from [[Java Edition 25w36a|25w36a]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=25w36b
|;prev
|301745|The client crashes when in the vicinity of an [[ender chest]].
|301749|The client crashes when in the vicinity of another [[player]].
}}</onlyinclude>
